event_text: Just as an eagle swoops down to snatch r_c, m_c uses {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} body to protect r_c against the assault. The eagle is unsuccessful in trying to carry either cat away and flies off, but m_c is left with a wound in reminder of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} deed.

history.scar: m_c was scarred while saving r_c from an eagle.
history.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after saving r_c from an eagle.
history.lead_death: died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds given to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} by an eagle

event_text: While watching the kittens play one moon, m_c wasn't paying attention and was picked up by a hawk! Fortunately, the hank couldn't carry m_c's weight and dropped {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, but m_c gained a nasty injury from the fall.

history.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after being dropped by a hawk.
history.lead_death: died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after being dropped by a hawk
